jd:
**Responsibilities:**
- Develop and maintain high-quality software solutions using .Net Framework and ASP.NET Core Web API.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement user-friendly applications using Angular 13-16.
- Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications through testing and debugging.
- Participate in code reviews.
- Work with stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
- Implement best practices in software development for efficiency and scalability.
- Provide technical support and troubleshooting for existing applications.
- Contribute to the documentation of software designs, processes, and user guides.
- Engage in agile development practices (sprint planning, retrospectives).
- Collaborate with finance and accounting teams to integrate software solutions with existing systems.
- Utilize domain knowledge in Procure to Pay and Payroll to develop solutions that streamline business operations.

**Required Skills/Tools/Languages:**
- Strong understanding and hands-on experience with .Net Framework and ASP.NET Core Web API.
- Proficiency in Angular (versions 13-16).
- Experience with .Net Core.
- Knowledge of Procure-to-Pay, Payroll, Finance, and Accounting domains.

**Experience:**
- Hands-on experience in developing web applications.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Commitment to continuous learning and staying current with emerging technologies and industry trends.

**Key responsibilities:**
- Contribute to the design and development of cross-platform mobile applications, ensuring seamless integration with our proprietary Sheet Music Core engine.
- Innovate and develop advanced features within our Sheet Music Core engine.
- Manage, maintain, and develop the Optical Music Recognition (OMR) system.
- Architect and design robust software solutions within the sheet music ecosystem.
- Develop and implement strategies for integrating sheet music technologies into other products.
- Write, test, and maintain high-quality code across multiple platforms and languages.
- Work closely with cross-functional teams.
- Ensure all developed solutions adhere to industry standards and best practices, conducting thorough testing including unit testing.
- Create and maintain detailed technical documentation.
- Participate in code reviews and follow best practices in modern web development.
- Work from user stories and requirements.

**Requirements**
- 1-5 years of software engineering experience.
- Experience working with NodeJS, Typescript, and VueJS.
- Familiarity with Vuetify or other Vue component frameworks.
- Familiarity with SQL.
- Experience with RESTful APIs, data structures, and integrations.
- Solid understanding of version control (Git) and Agile methodologies.
- Ability to work independently and deliver functional solutions with minimal oversight.

**Preferred**
- Experience with CapacitorJS for mobile app packaging and delivery.
- Experience with Apple Developer and Google Play Developer platforms.
- Familiarity with CI/CD Pipelines.
- Experience with music performance and the ability to read sheet music.

**Responsibilities:**
- Write code and ship features.
- Collaborate with product.
- Join an engineering pod (core app, retention, automation) and contribute to the mission.

**Required Skills/Tools/Languages:**
- Frontend: React, React Native.
- Backend: NodeJS, TypeScript.
- Infra: AWS, Go, Python, Docker, CI/CD.
- Data: Redis, Postgres, DynamoDB, Clickhouse.
- AI/ML: Python pipelines, LLM integrations.

**Experience:**
- Internship, co-op, or side project experience is a plus.

**Education:**
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Eagerness to learn, build, and grow.
- Comfort with ambiguity.
- Pride in building high-quality, user-first software.

**Responsibilities:**
- Design and develop user-facing applications using React and modern front-end tooling.
- Build and maintain backend services using Python, focusing on scalability, reliability, and performance.
- Implement APIs and service integrations that support complex healthcare workflows.
- Design and implement durable, fault-tolerant workflows using Temporal.io.
- Model and manage long-running, stateful healthcare processes (e.g., care gaps, quality measures, documentation workflows).
- Ensure system resilience, observability, and graceful failure handling in distributed systems.
- Optimize backend services for performance and cost efficiency.
- Work with healthcare data and workflows while adhering to security and compliance requirements (e.g., HIPAA).
- Integrate with healthcare standards and systems such as FHIR and interoperability APIs.
- Contribute to production-ready systems with strong testing, monitoring, and deployment practices.
- Collaborate on CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure supporting cloud-based deployments.
- Debug and resolve issues across the stack in production environments.

**Required Qualifications:**
- Strong experience building full-stack applications with Python on the backend and React on the frontend.
- Experience designing and consuming RESTful APIs (or GraphQL).
- Familiarity with distributed systems and asynchronous processing.
- Solid understanding of software engineering best practices, including testing, code reviews, and documentation.

**Preferred Skills:**
- Hands-on experience with Temporal.io or similar workflow orchestration systems.
- Experience working in healthcare or regulated environments (HIPAA familiarity a plus).
- Knowledge of healthcare data standards such as FHIR or HL7.
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure).
- Familiarity with containerization and infrastructure tools (Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform).

**Technical Tools Mentioned:** React, Python, Temporal.io.

**Responsibilities:**
*   Acquire, validate, and maintain telecom and technology service data.
*   Conduct proactive outreach to service providers via phone and email to obtain missing service details (e.g., term dates, circuit IDs, addresses, pricing).
*   Identify and contact appropriate provider contacts using provided lists, invoices, portals, and public resources.
*   Track outreach activity and document contacts and responses.
*   Review Excel/Smartsheet datasets to identify missing, inconsistent, or duplicate entries.
*   Validate data against invoices, provider communications, and internal documentation.
*   Standardize data formats (IDs, numbers, addresses, dates), merge/remove duplicates, and flag issues.
*   Enter newly gathered information into designated workbooks and Smartsheet project sheets.
*   Update service attributes (location, provider, service type, contract status) following defined validation rules.
*   Submit requests to move services to month-to-month terms or prevent auto-renewal.
*   Identify services for disconnection, initiate termination, track status, and confirm billing cessation.
*   Update records with new statuses and effective dates.
*   Maintain clear task tracking and logs in Smartsheet for all outreach, updates, and service requests.
*   Provide weekly summaries of progress, outstanding items, disconnect activity, and escalations.
*   Partner with BI, Customer Success, and Account Services teams.
*   Respond to on-demand data requests (e.g., associated numbers, term dates, circuit data).

**Required Skills/Tools/Languages:**
*   Advanced Excel skills (lookups, pivot tables, data validation, de-duplication).
*   Hands-on experience with Smartsheet or similar project/data tracking tools.
*   Data cleansing and normalization.
*   Record deduplication.
*   Invoice and portal navigation.
*   Use of LLM tools (e.g., ChatGPT) to draft emails or summarize documents.
*   Excellent written and verbal English communication.

**Required Experience:**
*   2+ years in technical support and/or data analysis within telecom/technology services or a closely related domain.
*   Proven experience conducting professional phone/email outreach.
*   Proven experience validating data against invoices and portals.
*   Accuracy working with large datasets.

**Work Setup Requirements:**
*   Computer with at least 8GB RAM, an Intel i5 core processor/AMD Ryzen 5 Processor or higher.
*   Internet speed of at least 40MBPS.
*   Headset with an extended mic that has noise cancellation and a webcam.
*   Back-up computer and internet connection.
*   Quiet, dedicated workspace at home.

**Working Hours:**
*   Available to work Monday–Friday, 9:00 a.m.–5:00 p.m. CST.

**Responsibilities:**
- Develop and maintain scalable backend and frontend applications
- Support and enhance existing systems and in-progress builds
- Create monitoring and automation tools for deployments and system health
- Build and document APIs and integration layers
- Interface with analysts, project managers, and stakeholders to understand business needs
- Collaborate in design/code reviews and advocate for clean, testable code
- Document technical processes and support deployment procedures
- Contribute to continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) improvements
- Provide occasional cross-team technical support
- Keep up with modern development best practices and toolsets

**Required Skills/Tools/Languages:**
- Solid experience with Java, C++, Python, HTML5, or similar languages
- Experience with React, Spring Boot, CSS3, JavaScript, Swift, JSON, Objective-C
- Experience with build tools such as Apache Maven
- Frontend development with TypeScript and frameworks like Next.js
- Experience using Git for version control
- Experience working with Node.js and npm
- Familiarity with environment variable management (e.g., using .env files or Doppler)
- Database experience with MS SQL Server or MySQL
- Experience writing technical documentation and user guides

**Experience:**
- 2+ years of hands-on software development experience
- Experience with mobile app development (Android/iOS) preferred

**Education:**
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Prior construction industry experience is a major plus

**Citizenship/Clearance Requirements:**
- This is an in-office role.
- Metropolitan Companies does not provide any relocation or visa sponsorship services. Out of area applicants will not be considered.

**Primary Responsibilities:**
- Design, develop, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement new features
- Identify and fix bugs, performance bottlenecks, and other issues
- Conduct code reviews to ensure adherence to best practices and coding standards
- Participate in the entire software development lifecycle, from concept and design to testing and deployment
- Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
- Analyze, investigate and provides explanations and interpretations within area of expertise
- Analyze and implement AI based solutions

**Required Qualifications:**
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent experience
- 4+ years of experience problem solving with contact center platforms (primarily voice)
- 2+ years of experience with Amazon Connect routing development
- Solid understanding of AI use cases and implementations
- Proficiency in git/GitHub version control
- Proven excellent technical growth, problem-solving and analytical skills
- Proven ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a team-oriented environment
- Proven solid communication and interpersonal skills

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud)
- Experience with Agile development methodologies
- Proficiency in IT Service Management (ITSM), specifically the Service Level Owner role
- Proficiency in CICD tools (GitHub)

**Responsibilities:**
- Own the design, development, and operation of an internal automation and provisioning platform.
- Build and maintain backend services, APIs, and automation workflows for customer onboarding and infrastructure provisioning.
- Develop and maintain automation for Windows-based infrastructure and Active Directory environments.
- Design resilient workflows with strong error handling, logging, and alerting.
- Maintain and improve cloud services in Microsoft Azure with a focus on security, reliability, and scalability.
- Troubleshoot complex production issues across application, automation, and infrastructure layers.
- Continuously improve system performance, reliability, and maintainability.
- Deliver clear technical documentation and operational runbooks.

**Required Skills/Tools/Languages:**
- Python
- Django
- PowerShell
- Microsoft Azure
- REST APIs
- Active Directory
- Windows infrastructure

**Experience:**
- Experience with Python and Django backend.
- Experience with PowerShell automation.
- Experience with Azure cloud services.
- Experience with Windows infrastructure.
- Comfort working across software, automation, and infrastructure layers.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Experience with workflow orchestration or automation platforms (e.g., Prefect).
- Infrastructure-as-Code experience (e.g., Bicep, ARM, Terraform).
- Background supporting Windows-based, virtualized, or DaaS environments (e.g., Hyper-V, SCVMM).
- Experience in MSP, SaaS, or regulated-industry environments.
- Frontend experience (e.g., React).

**Responsibilities:**
* Design, code, and implement systems and software solutions.
* Collaborate multi-functionally to create design artifacts and develop software.
* Contribute to product quality improvements and new business flows in agile squads.
* Develop robust and scalable products for various customer types.
* Design, document, and implement new systems and enhancements to existing software.
* Interact with business and technical stakeholders to deliver high-quality products.
* Deliver zero-defect code and ensure team deliverables meet business expectations.
* Design, implement, and evolve highly scalable and fault-tolerant web applications.
* Identify opportunities for product innovation and improvements.
* Contribute to the development process pipeline using CI/CD tools.
* Develop and maintain back-end services using Java and Spring Boot.
* Design and develop test automation frameworks.
* Maintain CI and CD pipelines, conduct performance and load testing, write automated test cases.
* Contribute to the design of backend databases and queries, API creation and consumption, and front-end UI development.
* Manage backend operations and batch jobs to maintain data.
* Leverage new technologies to build the next generation of the application stack.
* Work independently to develop software conforming to high standards of security, quality, performance, resiliency, and compliance.

**Required Skills/Tools/Languages:**
* **Expertise in Java.**
* Experience with REST APIs and JSON.
* Solid experience with back-end technologies: J2EE, JDBC, JMS.
* Experience with frameworks: Spring, Spring Batch, Spring Boot, vertex.
* Front-End development experience with Angular, React JS, and Node.JS.
* Hands-on experience with database technologies: MySQL, DB2, Oracle.
* Strong experience with Agile development, Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery.
* Experience with technologies: GIT, Maven, Jenkins, Chef, Sonar, JUnit.
* Exceptional troubleshooting and analytical skills.

**Preferred Skills/Tools/Languages:**
* Working experience with Kafka, Redis, Hazelcast, or NoSQL datastores.
* Experience building and deploying services using AI technologies (e.g., LangGraph, LangChain, A2A, MCP).
* Drive to learn new technologies such as Angular, React, Kubernetes, Docker, etc.
* Experience collaborating with Product, Test, Dev-ops, and Agile/Scrum teams.

**Experience:**
* 2 or more years of work experience with a Bachelor’s Degree.
* **Preferred:** 3 or more years of work experience with a Bachelor’s Degree or more than 2 years with an Advanced Degree.

**Education:**
* Bachelor’s Degree or Advanced Degree (e.g., Masters, MBA, JD, MD, PhD).

**Other Requirements:**
* Ability to multitask and handle multiple competing priorities with minimal direction.
* Must work well within a team.
* This is a hybrid position.
* Travel Requirements: 5-10% of the time.
